import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./BookList.css"; const Book = (book) => { const authors = book.author.join(', '); return (
{book.title}
Author: {authors} }
Total Editions: {book.edition_count}
First Publish Year: {book.first_publish_year}
) } export default Book
